ability.Solar Power: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x and loses 1/8 max HP per end of turn.

Calm Mind.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Air Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Giga Drain.effect: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target.

Rest.effect: The user falls asleep and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, or is already asleep.
